input: Someone hacked my email account and stole my personal data

special_acts.description: This law deals with cyber crimes like hacking, online fraud, identity theft, spreading obscene content, data theft, and misuse of computers, mobile phones, and the internet.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences relating to documents and to property marks
bns_sections.section_title: Having possession of document described in section 337 or section 338, knowing it to be forged and intending to use it as genuine.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes possession of a forged document knowing it to be forged.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences relating to documents and to property marks
bns_sections.section_title: Falsification of accounts.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes a clerk or servant who wilfully falsifies accounts to defraud.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences against property
bns_sections.section_title: Criminal breach of trust.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes a person entrusted with property who dishonestly uses or disposes of it.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences relating to documents and to property marks
bns_sections.section_title: Forgery.
bns_sections.section_desc: Defines forgery as making a false document with intent to cause damage or deceit.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences against property
bns_sections.section_title: Dishonest or fraudulent execution of deed of transfer containing false statement of consideration.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes executing a transfer deed containing false statements of consideration.

input: Caught selling drugs like heroin and cocaine

special_acts.act_full_name: Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances Act, 1985
special_acts.description: This law deals with crimes related to drugs such as ganja, charas, heroin, cocaine, and other intoxicating substances. It covers their production, sale, transport, possession, and consumption.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences affecting the public health, safety, convenience, decency and morals
bns_sections.section_title: Sale of adulterated drugs.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes selling adulterated drugs as genuine.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences affecting the public health, safety, convenience, decency and morals
bns_sections.section_title: Sale of drug as a different drug or preparation.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes selling one drug while pretending it is another.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences affecting the public health, safety, convenience, decency and morals
bns_sections.section_title: Adulteration of drugs.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes adulterating drugs to lessen efficacy or make them noxious.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences against property
bns_sections.section_title: Punishment for belonging to gang of robbers, etc.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes belonging to a gang associated for habitually committing theft or robbery.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of false evidence and offences against public justice
bns_sections.section_title: Taking gift to help to recover stolen property, etc.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes taking money to recover stolen property without helping to apprehend the thief.

special_acts.description: This law protects wild animals, birds, plants, forests, and protected areas. It punishes illegal hunting, wildlife trade, and destruction of habitats.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences affecting the public health, safety, convenience, decency and morals
bns_sections.section_title: Negligent conduct with respect to animal.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes negligence in taking care of animals.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences against property
bns_sections.section_title: Mischief by killing or maiming animal.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes mischief by killing or maiming any animal.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences against woman and child
bns_sections.section_title: Stalking.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes following or contacting a woman despite her disinterest, or monitoring her internet use.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of false evidence and offences against public justice
bns_sections.section_title: Resistance or obstruction to lawful apprehension or escape or rescue in cases not otherwise provided for.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes resistance to apprehension in cases not otherwise provided for.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences against woman and child
bns_sections.section_title: Procuration of child.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes inducing a child to go from any place for the purpose of illicit intercourse.

input: Marriage of a 16 year old girl

special_acts.description: This law prohibits child marriage and punishes those who perform, promote, or permit marriage of boys below 21 years and girls below 18 years.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences against woman and child
bns_sections.section_title: Marrying again during lifetime of husband or wife.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes bigamy with imprisonment up to 7 years.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences against woman and child
bns_sections.section_title: Marriage ceremony fraudulently gone through without lawful marriage.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes performing a marriage ceremony with fraudulent intent knowing it is not valid.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences against woman and child
bns_sections.section_title: Cohabitation caused by man deceitfully inducing belief of lawful marriage.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes a man who deceives a woman into believing they are married to cohabit with her.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences against woman and child
bns_sections.section_title: Sexual intercourse by husband upon his wife during separation.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes a husband having non-consensual sex with his wife during legal separation with 2 to 7 years in prison.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences against woman and child
bns_sections.section_title: Enticing or taking away or detaining with criminal intent a married woman.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes taking or detaining a married woman with intent for her to have illicit intercourse.

special_acts.description: This law punishes public servants who take bribes or misuse their official position for personal benefit.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences by or relating to public servants
bns_sections.section_title: Personating a public servant.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes pretending to be a public servant and doing any act in that assumed character.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of contempts of the lawful authority of public servants
bns_sections.section_title: Obstructing public servant in discharge of public functions.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes voluntarily obstructing a public servant in the discharge of their public functions.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences relating to coin, currency-notes, bank-notes, and government stamps
bns_sections.section_title: Effacing writing from substance bearing Government stamp, or removing from document a stamp used for it, with intent to cause loss to Government.
bns_sections.section_desc: Punishes removing writing from a stamp or removing a stamp from a document to cause loss to Government.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences relating to elections
bns_sections.section_title: Bribery.
bns_sections.section_desc: Defines bribery as giving gratification to induce a person to exercise an electoral right.

bns_sections.chapter_title: of offences relating to elections
bns_sections.section_title: Punishment for bribery.
bns_sections.section_desc: Prescribes imprisonment up to one year or fine for bribery.
